events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Customer issue categorized as refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
Support agent assigned to handle refund request for the wrong item received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to process the refund?
My order number is 123456789. I have attached a photo of the wrong item I received for your reference.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you should see the money back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for your help. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed on our end. Please check your account in the coming days and contact us if you have any further issues.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund successfully. Please let us know if everything is okay.
Yes, the refund appeared in my bank account today. Thanks again for the excellent support.
We are glad your issue is resolved. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime for assistance.
Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience.
